table.name: civicrm_prevnext_cache
table.comment: Table to cache items for navigation on civicrm searched results.

field.name: entity_table
field.title: Prev Next Entity Table
field.comment: physical tablename for entity being joined to discount, e.g. civicrm_event

field.name: entity_id1
field.title: Prev Next Entity ID 1
field.comment: FK to entity table specified in entity_table column.

field.name: entity_id2
field.title: Prev Next Entity ID 2
field.comment: FK to entity table specified in entity_table column.

field.name: cacheKey
field.title: Cache Key
field.comment: Unique path name for cache element of the searched item

field.name: data
field.title: Prev Next Data
field.comment: cached snapshot of the serialized data
